@amico_gina Hi Gina, For more information on travelling to South America (Guyana, Venezuela, Suriname) with us please click the link https://t.co/gL7vfX2MSs

data.text: When you’re in love, you count the miles apart. Let Caribbean Airlines help shorten them. Happy Valentine’s Day! https://t.co/4TBB6IgQCD #iflycaribbean #thecaribbeanidentity https://t.co/SjCuRSDol8
@datchickneeks Hey there, we're sorry to hear of your experience.Hope we can have another opportunity to restore your confidence in us. Looking forward to welcoming you on-board.

@BryceeBassey We wish to extend our apologies for any inconvenience experienced and also thank you for bringing this to our attention.  This will be shared with our Airport Manager for review and service improvement.

@BryceeBassey Hi there,

While we understand your disappointment it must be mentioned that it is the responsibility of all passengers to ensure they meet the specific immigration requirements of their destination prior to their scheduled departure date.

@CatYuracka Hi there,

We are two different entities.

Buy the best bundle! Our Economy Flex fare gives you maximum value with 2 checked bags, one carry-on and your personal bag. Visit https://t.co/mqP35nqfn9 to browse all our travel options #iflycaribbean #thecaribbeanidentity https://t.co/Uwr9r8H5ot

@iJeDani38 If you have submitted a complaint to our Customer Experience Department please send us a Private Message with your unique claim number.
Additionally, we recommend deleting your tweet as it contains your personal email address.
@iJeDani38 We're terribly sorry about this.  If you're currently at the airport you may speak with the Representative On-Duty for assistance.

We always want to ensure a smooth ride for you and all of our passengers. Hope to have to you on-board again soon RT @MsSahcee: All I can say is @iflycaribbean pilots performs the most perfect landing...is why I love them #CarribbeanAirlines #perfectlanding #smoothflight POS-MIA

Wishing you all the best for #2020
